review: Brings back good memories. I remember back in 6th grade when i would come home from school and play this game on my ps2 every day. now i do the exact same thing but on my pc10/10

Dislikes incoming but mehstop crying about microtransactionsyou aren't being forced to buy extra thingsyou have a choice on whether you want to buy extra things or not but some people still choose to have a whinge about it <3gg would play another 500 hours
Fun game and have made some good friends through it.
